revision.text: ===Gaining EVs (Methods)=== Different methods of catching a Pokémon will yield different amounts of EVs. If the [[Challenge Mode|Slow EVs Challenge Mode]] is activated, you will gain EVs at a 10x slower rate (You gain the same amount of EVs, but require 10x as many EVs to yield the same bonus. In some instances, the yield of EVs is further modified by an external factor (see below tables for specific information).
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
